sqlMap.insert:
SELECT T_PROCESS_TASK_ASSIGNEEP_SEQ.NEXTVAL AS VALUE FROM DUAL
insert into T_PROCESS_TASK_ASSIGNEE_PERSON (ID, PROCESS_TASK_ASSIGNEE_ID, EXECUTION_ID, TASK_ID, TASK_ASSIGNEE_ID,PARENT_ID) values (#id:DECIMAL:-9999#, #processTaskAssigneeId:DECIMAL:-9999#, #executionId:VARCHAR#, #taskId:VARCHAR#, #taskAssigneeId:DECIMAL:-9999#,#id:DECIMAL:-9999#)

SELECT T_PROCESS_TASK_ASSIGNEEP_SEQ.NEXTVAL AS VALUE FROM DUAL
insert into T_PROCESS_TASK_ASSIGNEE_PERSON (ID, PROCESS_TASK_ASSIGNEE_ID, EXECUTION_ID, TASK_ID, TASK_ASSIGNEE_ID,PARENT_ID,ISCHILD,TASK_ASSIGNEE_STATE) values (#id:DECIMAL:-9999#, #processTaskAssigneeId:DECIMAL:-9999#, #executionId:VARCHAR#, #taskId:VARCHAR#, #taskAssigneeId:DECIMAL:-9999#,#parentId#,#isChild#,#taskAssigneeState#)
sqlMap.update: update T_PROCESS_TASK_ASSIGNEE_PERSON set TASK_ASSIGNEE_STATE = '$taskAssgineeState$' where EXECUTION_ID = '$executionId$' and task_assignee_id = '$taskAssingee$'

update T_PROCESS_TASK_ASSIGNEE_PERSON set TASK_ASSIGNEE_STATE = '$taskAssgineeState$' where EXECUTION_ID = '$executionId$'
task_assignee_id = '$taskAssingee$'
parent_id = '$parentId$'
id = '$objId$'
TASK_ASSIGNEE_STATE=#isUpdate#
ischild=#ischild#
sqlMap.select: select ID, PROCESS_TASK_ASSIGNEE_ID, EXECUTION_ID, TASK_ID, TASK_ASSIGNEE_ID,TASK_ASSIGNEE_STATE from T_PROCESS_TASK_ASSIGNEE_PERSON where EXECUTION_ID = '$executionId$' and TASK_ASSIGNEE_STATE = '$taskAssgineeState$' and TASK_ID='$taskId$'

select ID, PROCESS_TASK_ASSIGNEE_ID, EXECUTION_ID, TASK_ID, TASK_ASSIGNEE_ID,TASK_ASSIGNEE_STATE from T_PROCESS_TASK_ASSIGNEE_PERSON where EXECUTION_ID = '$executionId$' and TASK_ASSIGNEE_STATE = '$taskAssgineeState$' and TASK_ID='$taskId$' and ischild='$isChild$'
sqlMap.delete:
delete from T_PROCESS_TASK_ASSIGNEE_PERSON
ID = #id:DECIMAL#
PROCESS_TASK_ASSIGNEE_ID = #processTaskAssigneeId:DECIMAL#
EXECUTION_ID = #executionId:VARCHAR#
TASK_ID = #taskId:VARCHAR#
TASK_ASSIGNEE_ID = #taskAssigneeId:DECIMAL#
sqlMap.update:
update T_PROCESS_TASK_ASSIGNEE_PERSON
ID = #record.id:DECIMAL:-9999#
PROCESS_TASK_ASSIGNEE_ID = #record.processTaskAssigneeId:DECIMAL:-9999#
EXECUTION_ID = #record.executionId:VARCHAR#
TASK_ID = #record.taskId:VARCHAR#
TASK_ASSIGNEE_ID = #record.taskAssigneeId:DECIMAL:-9999#

update T_PROCESS_TASK_ASSIGNEE_PERSON
ID = #record.id:DECIMAL:-9999#
PROCESS_TASK_ASSIGNEE_ID = #record.processTaskAssigneeId:DECIMAL:-9999#
EXECUTION_ID = #record.executionId:VARCHAR#
TASK_ID = #record.taskId:VARCHAR#
TASK_ASSIGNEE_ID = #record.taskAssigneeId:DECIMAL:-9999#
ID = #template.id:DECIMAL#
PROCESS_TASK_ASSIGNEE_ID = #template.processTaskAssigneeId:DECIMAL#
EXECUTION_ID = #template.executionId:VARCHAR#
TASK_ID = #template.taskId:VARCHAR#
TASK_ASSIGNEE_ID = #template.taskAssigneeId:DECIMAL#
